Name: Passion Fruit Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Cut passion fruits in half and scoop out flesh into shaker (saving one half for garnish). Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: The rum character comes through in this tropically fruity cocktail.
